tasks.label: cmake-build-debug
tasks.command: mkdir -p build && cd build && cmake -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Debug -DCMAKE_CXX_FLAGS_DEBUG='-g -O0' .. && cmake --build .

tasks.label: cmake-build-tests
tasks.command: mkdir -p build && cd build && cmake -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Debug -DBUILD_TESTING=ON .. && make
